mapper.select: select SID, TOKENID, OPER, POSTCODE, MOBILE, OPENFLAG, RESERVE3, RESERVE2, PROVINCEEN, NAME, CITYEN, USERNAME, CITYID, POSTCODE2, CITY, PHONE, PROVINCE, COUNTRYID, EMAIL, PROVINCEID, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE4, COUNTRY, OPERTIME, COUNTRYEN, TOKENTYPE, FLAG, PASSWORD, DISTRICTID, CONTACT, DISTRICT, COMPANY, DISTRICTEN, STREETEN, CONTACTEN, COMPANYEN, STREET from db_huahanseller where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, TOKENID, OPER, POSTCODE, MOBILE, OPENFLAG, RESERVE3, RESERVE2, PROVINCEEN, NAME, CITYEN, USERNAME, CITYID, POSTCODE2, CITY, PHONE, PROVINCE, COUNTRYID, EMAIL, PROVINCEID, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE4, COUNTRY, OPERTIME, COUNTRYEN, TOKENTYPE, FLAG, PASSWORD, DISTRICTID, CONTACT, DISTRICT, COMPANY, DISTRICTEN, STREETEN, CONTACTEN, COMPANYEN, STREET from db_huahanseller
mapper.sql: SID , TOKENID , OPER , POSTCODE , MOBILE , OPENFLAG , RESERVE3 , RESERVE2 , PROVINCEEN , NAME , CITYEN , USERNAME , CITYID , POSTCODE2 , CITY , PHONE , PROVINCE , COUNTRYID , EMAIL , PROVINCEID , CREATETIME , RESERVE1 , RESERVE4 , COUNTRY , OPERTIME , COUNTRYEN , TOKENTYPE , FLAG , PASSWORD , DISTRICTID , CONTACT , DISTRICT , COMPANY , DISTRICTEN , STREETEN , CONTACTEN , COMPANYEN , STREET

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TOKENID = #{tokenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PROVINCEEN = #{provinceen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CITYEN = #{cityen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CITYID = #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
POSTCODE2 = #{postcode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
COUNTRYID = #{countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PROVINCEID = #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
COUNTRYEN = #{countryen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TOKENTYPE = #{tokentype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DISTRICTID = #{districtid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DISTRICTEN = #{districten,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
STREETEN = #{streeten,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CONTACTEN = #{contacten,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
COMPANYEN = #{companyen,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
STREET = #{street,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
